name: Abu Simbel
quote: 'The heads of Rameses II at Abu Simbel and, for that matter, the skyscrapers of New York, have another idea of man.' - John Leonard

name: Bananue Rice Terraces
quote: 'The buffalo that arrives late will have to drink muddy water and eat dry grass.' - Vietnamese Proverb

name: Cheomseongdae
quote: 'When it is darkest, men see the stars.' - Ralph Waldo Emerson

name: Chogha Zanbil
quote: 'Hand added to hand, and a man's house is built up.' - Sumerian Proverb
